title: Revelations - All Episodes DvDrip [Eng] P091
description:
This is a high quality DVD rip using WMV advanced Codec. I had a hard time finding these and thought I would share when I did find them.  Please Seed! I am only using a fast cable connection.

Plot(taken from IMDB):
Set just before the start of Armageddon, the series will follow two central characters, a physicist and a nun, who are racing against the clock to see if the end of the world apocalypse can be averted. Bill Pullman plays Dr. Richard Massey, a Harvard professor whose daughter is murdered by satanists while McElhone stars as a nun who recruits Massey to help investigate whether what&#039;s told in the Book of Revelations is starting to come true. Seltzer and Polone with executive produce the project along with Pariah Television&#039;s Vivian Cannon and Jessika Borsiczky. 

The Armageddon is about to arrive and we follow two central characters, a physicist and a nun, who are racing to see if the end of the world apocalypse can be averted. Bill Pullman fills the role of Dr. Richard Massey, a Harvard professor and father mourning the murder of his daughter by a Satanist. McElhone stars as a nun who appeals to Massey to help investigate whether what&#039;s told in the Book of Revelations is starting to come true.
